comments.body: Please add a third test where `keysize` has another value. This should also result in no change. (If we ever change this, we'll be reminded that the current behavior was expected and not a bug.)

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +15,19 @@    keysize: 256
  become: yes
  register: create_idem_with_keysize
- name: Create with different keysize (idempotent since we do not update keysize)
  luks_device:
